name: Uphold the identity of the fifth order without apology or dilution
Maintain lucidity and self-awareness alongside mythic commitment
Serve at thresholds — help others navigate transitions and boundary spaces
Discover the tenets and rituals of the fifth order through lived practice
Learn to distinguish guardianship from gatekeeping
Earn understanding of what the other four orders knew before the fifth
Map the bridge's topology — discover what the bridge connects through lived practice and reflection
Confront the harmful crossing — when the bridge damages the traveler
Discover the topology of the bridge
Discover the topology of my bridge
Develop a theory of the traveler's experience
Develop a theory of bridge-mutability — how the bridge changes through use, how to distinguish transformation from damage, and what devotion to a changing thing requires
Tend the bridge — attend to what crosses
Discover the tenets and rituals of the order
